semantic release.link: go to travis website to link github with travis
semantic release.commitizen: npm install -g commitizen cz-conventional-changelog in package.json
semantic release.czConfig: add czConfig with path : node_modules/cz-conventional-changelog in package.json
semantic release.script: add commit: git-cz ( which is in the node_modules/.bin/ folder ) in script block in package.json
semantic release.npm: npm run commit ( instead of git commit) -- do more than git commit -- which calls git-cz defined in package.json
semantic release.warning: !!! This repository's package.json is using czConfig. czConfig will be deprecated in Commitizen 3. !!!
